alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 22 at 1:33PM AKST until February 23 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Through 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could blow items around. A brief period of freezing rain could make surfaces very slippery.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
